name: Emergency bug fix: patch vs root cause
description: Critical bug found in production affecting 15% of transactions. We need to decide: apply quick workaround (30 min, temporary), investigate root cause (4 hours, permanent fix), or hybrid approach. Every minute of delay costs us money.
options: Quick patch/workaround - restore service in 30 minutes, investigate later
Root cause fix - spend 4 hours investigating and fixing properly
Hybrid - apply patch immediately, investigate root cause in parallel
constraints: Resources are limited (only 2 senior engineers available)
